Name: Develop Grid Capacity
Documentation: End-to-end value stream to plan, deliver, and release grid capacity and topology.

Name: Forecast Grid Needs
Documentation: Forecast long- and near-term demand/supply to determine capacity gaps.

Name: Identify Grid Options
Documentation: Identify and evaluate expansion, reinforcement, and non-network options.

Name: Obtain Permits and Easements
Documentation: Secure statutory approvals, permits, consents, wayleaves, and land access.

Name: Engineer Grid Assets
Documentation: Produce detailed engineering designs and specifications for grid assets.

Name: Procure and Construct Assets
Documentation: Source materials and contractors and build assets per approved designs.

Name: Commission Assets
Documentation: Test, integrate, and commission new or upgraded assets into the grid.

Name: Release Capacity to Operations
Documentation: Handover assets and release usable capacity to operations.

Name: Connect Customer to Grid
Documentation: End-to-end value stream to provide compliant physical connections for customers.

Name: Receive Connection Application
Documentation: Receive and register customer connection requests and prerequisites.

Name: Assess Technical Feasibility
Documentation: Assess technical feasibility for the requested location, capacity, and quality.

Name: Offer Connection and Terms
Documentation: Prepare and issue a technical/commercial connection offer with terms and costs.

Name: Design Connection Solution
Documentation: Engineer the specific connection design to standards and codes.

Name: Construct and Commission Connection
Documentation: Build, test, and commission the connection assets.

Name: Energize and Hand Over
Documentation: Energize the connection and complete operational/customer handover.

Name: Provide Network Transport Service
Documentation: Operate the grid to transport power within contracted parameters and quality.

Name: Onboard Network User
Documentation: Set up new user agreements, credentials, and commercial arrangements.

Name: Configure Access and Constraints
Documentation: Configure network access rights and operational constraints.

Name: Schedule and Nominate Flows
Documentation: Receive, validate, and process schedules and nominations.

Name: Monitor Power Quality
Documentation: Monitor voltage, frequency, and power quality against standards.

Name: Manage Outages and Maintenance
Documentation: Plan and execute outages, switching, and maintenance activities.

Name: Bill Network Usage
Documentation: Calculate, validate, and issue transport service charges.

Name: Balance and Secure Power System
Documentation: Maintain real-time system balance and security to avoid outages.

Name: Prepare System Operating Plan
Documentation: Prepare day-ahead and intraday operating plans and constraints.

Name: Monitor System State
Documentation: Monitor SCADA/EMS data and system conditions in real time.

Name: Balance and Congestion Manage
Documentation: Dispatch balancing resources and manage congestion and constraints.

Name: Manage Contingencies and Restoration
Documentation: Respond to disturbances and restore service safely.

Name: Settle Balancing Actions
Documentation: Calculate and settle balancing energy and capacity actions.

Name: Settle and Inform Market Participants
Documentation: Provide accurate, transparent settlements and reports to stakeholders.

Name: Collect Metering and Event Data
Documentation: Collect metering and relevant event data from participants and devices.

Name: Validate and Aggregate Data
Documentation: Validate, estimate, and aggregate data for settlement readiness.

Name: Calculate Charges and Settlements
Documentation: Compute tariffs, charges, and settlement amounts per rules.

Name: Issue Statements and Invoices
Documentation: Produce and issue statements, invoices, and charge notices.

Name: Publish Regulatory and Transparency Reports
Documentation: Publish regulatory, market, and transparency reports.

Name: Grid Capacity Management
Documentation: Capability to plan, deliver, and release grid capacity and topology.

Name: Grid Needs Forecasting
Documentation: Capability to forecast grid demand/supply and identify capacity gaps.

Name: Grid Option Analysis
Documentation: Capability to analyze network and non-network expansion options.

Name: Permitting and Wayleave Acquisition
Documentation: Capability to secure permits, consents, and land-use rights.

Name: Asset Engineering Design
Documentation: Capability to design grid assets to standards and performance needs.

Name: Asset Procurement and Construction
Documentation: Capability to procure materials/services and construct assets.

Name: Asset Commissioning
Documentation: Capability to test, integrate, and commission assets.

Name: Capacity Release
Documentation: Capability to hand over assets and release usable capacity.

Name: Connection Service Management
Documentation: Capability to manage end-to-end customer connection services.

Name: Connection Application Intake
Documentation: Capability to receive, qualify, and register connection applications.

Name: Connection Feasibility Assessment
Documentation: Capability to assess technical feasibility and constraints.

Name: Connection Offer Structuring
Documentation: Capability to craft technical and commercial connection offers.

Name: Connection Detailed Design
Documentation: Capability to create detailed connection designs and specifications.

Name: Connection Build and Commission
Documentation: Capability to build, test, and commission connection assets.

Name: Energization and Handover
Documentation: Capability to energize connections and complete handover.

Name: Network Transport Management
Documentation: Capability to manage network transport services and performance.

Name: Network User Onboarding
Documentation: Capability to onboard and set up network users and agreements.

Name: Access Configuration
Documentation: Capability to configure access rights and operational constraints.

Name: Flow Scheduling
Documentation: Capability to manage schedules and nominations.

Name: Power Quality Monitoring
Documentation: Capability to monitor and assure power quality.

Name: Outage and Maintenance Management
Documentation: Capability to plan and manage outages and maintenance.

Name: Network Usage Billing
Documentation: Capability to rate, bill, and reconcile network usage.

Name: System Balancing Management
Documentation: Capability to balance the power system and ensure security.

Name: Operational Planning
Documentation: Capability for day-ahead and intraday operational planning.

Name: System State Monitoring
Documentation: Capability to monitor system state and situational awareness.

Name: Balancing and Congestion Control
Documentation: Capability to balance supply/demand and manage constraints.

Name: Contingency Response and Restoration
Documentation: Capability to respond to incidents and restore service.

Name: Balancing Settlement
Documentation: Capability to settle balancing market and actions.

Name: Market Settlement Management
Documentation: Capability to perform market settlements and transparency reporting.

Name: Meter and Event Data Collection
Documentation: Capability to collect settlement-relevant meter and event data.

Name: Data Validation and Aggregation
Documentation: Capability to validate, estimate, and aggregate settlement data.

Name: Charge and Settlement Calculation
Documentation: Capability to calculate tariffs, charges, and settlements.

Name: Statement and Invoice Issuance
Documentation: Capability to issue statements and invoices to parties.

Name: Regulatory and Market Reporting
Documentation: Capability to produce regulatory and market transparency reports.

Name: Grid Capacity Portfolio
Documentation: Portfolio of artifacts produced/used to develop grid capacity.

Name: Grid Needs Forecast
Documentation: Forecast documents and datasets of grid needs and gaps.

Name: Grid Options Assessment
Documentation: Evaluations of options with costs, benefits, and impacts.

Name: Permit and Easement Package
Documentation: Compiled permits, consents, and land-rights documentation.

Name: Asset Engineering Package
Documentation: Engineering designs, drawings, and specifications package.

Name: Construction Work Package
Documentation: Construction work orders, plans, and method statements.

Name: Commissioning Record
Documentation: Records of tests, approvals, and commissioning outcomes.

Name: Released Capacity Record
Documentation: Record confirming capacity release and handover to operations.

Name: Connection Portfolio
Documentation: Portfolio of artifacts for customer connection services.

Name: Connection Application
Documentation: Customer application and supporting information.

Name: Feasibility Report
Documentation: Assessment report of technical feasibility and constraints.

Name: Connection Offer
Documentation: Formal connection offer including terms, scope, and price.

Name: Connection Design Package
Documentation: Design drawings and specifications for the connection.

Name: Connection Commissioning Report
Documentation: Test results and commissioning report for the connection.

Name: Energization Certificate
Documentation: Certificate confirming energization and readiness.

Name: Transport Service Portfolio
Documentation: Portfolio of transport service agreements, plans, and records.

Name: Network Access Agreement
Documentation: Executed access agreement and schedules.

Name: Access and Constraint Profile
Documentation: Profile of access rights, capacities, and constraints.

Name: Schedule and Nomination
Documentation: Schedules and nominations submitted by users.

Name: Power Quality Record
Documentation: Power quality measurements, alarms, and logs.

Name: Outage Plan
Documentation: Planned outage and switching plans and approvals.

Name: Network Charge Statement
Documentation: Statement detailing network usage charges.

Name: System Operation Portfolio
Documentation: Portfolio of system operating plans, logs, and actions.

Name: Operating Plan
Documentation: Operating plan documents and constraints.

Name: System State Dataset
Documentation: SCADA/EMS datasets and snapshots of system state.

Name: Balancing Action Set
Documentation: Records of balancing actions, bids, and dispatches.

Name: Restoration Plan and Log
Documentation: Restoration plans and post-event logs.

Name: Balancing Settlement Statement
Documentation: Statements for balancing settlements and charges.

Name: Settlement Portfolio
Documentation: Portfolio of settlement data, calculations, and statements.

Name: Raw Meter Data Set
Documentation: Raw metering data collected from devices and parties.

Name: Validated Meter Data
Documentation: Validated, estimated, and aggregated meter data.

Name: Settlement Calculation
Documentation: Intermediate calculation datasets and results.

Name: Settlement Statement
Documentation: Final settlement statement or invoice to parties.

Name: Regulatory Report
Documentation: Regulatory and transparency reports and submissions.
